content: Game is great! Devs were responsive and rushed out multiple updates to correct issues and bugs I was experiencing with the game. More devs should be like this.
replyContent: Edit: Awesome, thank you so much! :) Thanks for your feedback. I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with the game. The bug that you mentioned has been fixed in the new version (1.0.20) that is released a few minutes ago. Please update the game to the latest version. We apologize for the inconvenience.

content: There is a bug where at day 12 after 4th passenger no one is able to come to the counter.Time ticks away but no matter how much you click on next no one comes. Disappointing a bit. Edit: Great response from dev's.Thanks for the update.

content: The game is great. It's very fun and the creators are great about fixing bugs and getting back to you with other problems. The game and it's creators are fantastic.
replyContent: We are truly happy that you enjoyed our game. Thank you so much for your evaluation. Your praise will help us to create more interesting games.

content: I cant see any text on any of the buttons. Its impossible to play the game. I want my money back. New update claimed to fix, problem is now worse and no text is visible in the game. Another update, fixed menu text but now can't read rulebook text. Soooo still can't play. Still want money back. Still is a bad rip off of a good game. Also, are you using Google translate? If so, stop. Be warned, devs will ignore your emails and issues and hand out cookie cutter responses to seem prudent. Refunded.
replyContent:
Edited 2: would you mind to try our new version (1.0.20) one more time? I hope the new version can be change your mind.
Edited 1: Thanks for your feedback, all the bugs that you mentioned has been fixed in the new version (1.0.20). We apologize for the inconvenience, anyway regarding refund request, please email us at support@blackbordergame.com.

content: Editing again because they never got back to me and after the most recent update people don't come to the window so I can't proceed. Edit: excellent response from the devs, which I really appreciate. Text issue is fixed! Awesome concept, but unplayable in it's current state. English translation is terrible to the point I couldn't stand to read it. Game crashes frequently while loading the new work day. Finally, the speaker menu went blank on my game at day 14. Tried reinstalling but no help.
replyContent:
Edited: would you mind to try our new version (1.0.20) one more time? I hope the new version can be change your mind.
Thanks for your feedback and thanks for the bug reporting, the bug that you mentioned has been fixed in the new version (1.0.20). Please update the game to the latest version. We apologize for the inconvenience.

content: on day 24, I'm supposed to let three artists pass; however, the person that shows up to drop that list never actually does so .. so, I'm not having this list .. that's slightly disappointing, so far. other than that, the game is very good in the sense that it provides some new/fresh gameplay .. it's pretty unique and not a simple copycat from some other game on here (like so many MMOs that feel the exact same)

content: Im enjoying the game but seems like a few bugs for example money is deducted for food and heat twice when you select them. Also regarding the name and fingerprints its a bit confusing how it works. It seems to be as long as fingerprints matches one of the names its fine but its always different when. Few maybe translation errors but other than that its fun.
replyContent: I'm sorry to hear you're having trouble with the game. In the new version, which will be released in a few days, most of your concerns have been addressed and the issues will be fixed. Update: Hello, we've fixed it. Please update the game to latest version. Thanks for reporting :)

content: Gameplay is alright, but pacing of dialog seems off; skip options don't always exist, and it's possible to skip some dialog that would be important for the structure of the story (visitors without a passport for instance). Several of the dialog snippets are in need of QC, and the script could also use a look-through for a more polished result.
replyContent:
Edited 2: Would you mind to try our latest version (1.0.20)? I hope it can be change your mind.
Edited 1: Hello, we've fixed some bugs. Please update the game to latest version. Thanks for reporting :)

content: Enjoyable game so far. Only comments I have regarding game play. 1. The dialogue takes away too much time.. maybe freeze the timer if the person talks to you after being accepted/rejected 2. The dialogue blocks the height scale in the back 3. The next person should automatically come when you clear the person at the window As the developer mentioned regarding point#3. There's an unmarked yellow check box in the lower right corner in the dialogue selection screen, that turns on auto next.
replyContent:
Thank you for your suggestions. :)
1- For long chats, the timer is freeze, nevertheless you can use the skip button to ignore them.
2- I've forwarded your feedback to our developers.
3- You can check the box "Call Next Person Automatically" that is located in lower right corner of the screen.
Feel free to contact us at support@blackbordergame.com

content: Entertaining game, nice gameplay loop, but the English translation is poor.
replyContent: We care about your feelings and every little encouragement makes us better :) So, if you like this app, please consider giving us a 5-star rating. Can you email us about the issue that you mentioned so we can talk with more details about it? This will be a great help to us, please contact at support@blackbordergame.com

content: Great game! Enjoying it in the first day but I have some minor issues and suggestion, would you guys change the skip button to a fast forward button to fast forward the text, instead of skipping the conversation entirely? I wanna read what they have to say but the text pace is too slow and I don't want to skip it. And also please add a lot more mechanics like we can also check the ID number or some sort, and the conversation are repeating. Will change the rating if I liked the next update
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. We will recommend them to the related department. Can you email us about the things you mentioned so we can talk more about it? This will be a great help to us, please contact at support@blackbordergame.com

content: I just bought this game and it was worth it but I think it needs some update like Animation,Text
replyContent: Thank you for your suggestions. We will recommend them to the related department. We are always collecting user feedback and emails that we can apply with updates. We really appreciate if you kindly let us know your detail feedback about any mistake or development suggestion. Please email us at support@blackbordergame.com

content: Great game but the pacing for the characters is a little slow and some charaters tend to talk a lot and it takes up a lot of time. It would be way cooler if it was paced alittle faster and the characters had more to say- I met a lot of characters who repeated the same thing and it got a little annoying overtime.
replyContent: Thanks for your valuable feedback. For long chats you can use the skip button to ignore them. Regarding to pacing for the characters we will add a new feature in the new version that the next person will automatically enter the room. Regarding to duplicate chats we will try to add more various chats the new version, which will be released soon. :)

content: I recently replayed the entirety of Papers Please so this game definitely caught my eye when I read about it in a article about similar games! The art is beautiful and well-done and many aspects of the game remind me of Papers Please! There are many typos and the animations can be awkward, especially the speech animations which block the height chart. However I still find myself enjoying the game - looking forward to the next update!
replyContent: Thanks for your valuable feedback. The new version of the game will be released in the next few days. Most of issues which you mentioned will be resolved in the new version of the game, regarding chat animations, if the text size becomes smaller, the texts may not be seen well on some mobile phones. our contact : support@blackbordergame.com

content: Good game! thx
replyContent: Glad you like it! :)

content: Great game. If you like Papers Please you will enjoy this.

content: Absolutely love this after waiting for its release! Some english errors but nothing too bad. Only faults are some text bubbles are too small and cut off text and I also get a glitch were the passport completely disappears when trying to move it to the work bench, forcing me to quit the game and redo the whole game. Other than that it's great! Would love to see more elements and maybe harder conditions (such as more details to check, fraudulent stamps and such) keep up the great work!
replyContent: The new version of the game will be released in the next few days. The issues which you mentioned will be resolved in the new version of the game. However, regarding the glitch, we could not reproduce the glitch, can you please send us an email and explain further about this issue at info@blackbordergame.com ? Thanks for reporting :)
